    • onAttachEvent

      @Subscribe public void onAttachEvent(com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachEvent event)
      Handles the attach event for the virtualized list view. Sets up a periodic task to refresh and update the data for virtualized entities at a configurable interval. The method also ensures the process statistics and status are updated for each entity, while invoking additional actions to refresh associated menus and processes.
      Parameters:
      event - The AttachEvent object that contains information about the UI attach event.

    • onDetachEvent

      @Subscribe public void onDetachEvent(com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachEvent event)
